name: Hunter's Shroud
description:
Take a weekend off at a cabin in the woods!

A short horror game made mostly as a technical demonstration of my programming skills.

Hope you enjoy it.

Thanks for playing!

All source code is available at: https://github.com/Marcelofilho07/Hunter-s-Shrou

Made using PSXFX by Marci: https://marcis.itch.io/psxfx

Many assets for this game are from Miziziziz Retro3DGraphicsCollection at: https://github.com/Miziziziz/Retro3DGraphicsCollection

Thanks to Carline for helping me with some 3D models. Check his work at: https://carlinebruno.wixsite.com/portfolio
